name: AgriLife_Required_Links
description: WordPress Plugin of required DOM elements for AgriFlex 3, a child theme of Genesis.

scripts.once: npm run once:packages && npm run once:compass && npm run watch
scripts.once:compass: compass create --css-dir css --sass-dir css/src --images-dir images --output-style expanded --relative-assets --quiet --bare
scripts.package: npm install && npm run once:compass && compass compile
